<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Enable a rule</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/v2/security/rules/{id}/enable"}></MethodEndpoint>



Enables a security rule by its ID.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"id","description":"Rule ID","in":"path","required":true,"example":305572,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"default"} value={"default"}><div>

successful operation
